where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bif_dispatch_human_resource
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1
AND account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM `bif_dispatch_human_resource` WHERE mobile = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND flag_deleted = 0

SELECT hr.id, hr.first_name AS firstName, hr.last_name AS lastName, val.description AS idType, val.id_code AS idCode, val.positive_image_url AS positiveImageUrl, val.contrary_image_url AS contraryImageUrl, val.handheld_image_url AS handheldImageUrl FROM bif_dispatch_human_resource hr LEFT JOIN(SELECT vv.*,dic.description FROM bif_dispatch_hr_autonym_valid vv LEFT JOIN cfg_data_dictionary dic on dic.`value` = vv.id_type WHERE vv.flag_last = 1 AND dic.type = "IDTYPE") val on val.user_id = hr.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cfg_data_dictionary WHERE type = "INVOICE-TYPE") dic on hr.provide_invoice_type = dic.`value` WHERE hr.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hr.flag_deleted = 0 AND hr.flag_available = 1

SELECT hr.id, hr.belong_company AS belongCompany , hr.belong_company_bussiness_license_code AS belongCompanyBussinessLicenseCode, hr.flag_provide_invoice AS flagProvideInvoice, dic.description AS provideInvoiceType, hr.provide_invoice_rate AS provideInvoiceRate FROM bif_dispatch_human_resource hr LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cfg_data_dictionary WHERE type = "INVOICE-TYPE") dic on dic.`value` = hr.provide_invoice_type WHERE hr.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hr.flag_deleted = 0 AND hr.flag_available = 1

SELECT hr.id, hr.belong_company AS belongCompany , hr.belong_company_bussiness_license_code AS belongCompanyBussinessLicenseCode, hr.flag_provide_invoice AS flagProvideInvoice, dic.description AS provideInvoiceType, hr.provide_invoice_rate AS provideInvoiceRate FROM bif_dispatch_human_resource hr LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cfg_data_dictionary WHERE type = "INVOICE-TYPE") dic on dic.`value` = hr.provide_invoice_type WHERE hr.flag_deleted = 0 AND hr.flag_available = 1
mapper.update:
update bif_dispatch_human_resource
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
belong_company = #{belongCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
belong_company_bussiness_license_code = #{belongCompanyBussinessLicenseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_provide_invoice = #{flagProvideInvoice,jdbcType=BIT},
provide_invoice_type = #{provideInvoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provide_invoice_rate = #{provideInvoiceRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM `bif_dispatch_human_resource` WHERE id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND flag_deleted = 0 AND flag_available = 1
